data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Cordillera. Through your servants plant 47 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cordillera, Paraguay
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Cordillera, Paraguay to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Cordillera prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Cordillera, Paraguay and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Cordillera, Paraguay.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Cordillera, Paraguay to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Cordillera, Paraguay.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.section_summary:
the state of Cordillera, Paraguay has a population of 238,100.

We estimate Cordillera has 19,078 people who might know Jesus, 208,533 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 10,488 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 12 neighbors who need Jesus.
